text: Please Please Me is the first studio album by the English band The Beatles. It was produced by George Martin and was released in the United Kingdom on 22 March 1963 on EMI's Parlophone record label. Eight of the fourteen songs were written by Lennonâ€“McCartney. Please Please Me was voted 39th on Rolling Stones list of the "500 Greatest Albums of All Time" in 2012. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:The Beatles albums Category:Debut albums Category:1963 albums Category:Rock and roll albums Category:Pop albums
title: Please Please Me
